titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Chanticleer Photograph Collection, 1998-ongoing
titlestmt.author: Processed by: Kim Sims; machine-readable finding aid created by: Sherrie Bowser

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid derived from XML authoring program. Date of source: Processed by Kim Sims, December 2005; Finding Aid encoded by Jill Katte, University Archives, Duke University,Date of source:

change.item: Converted from dtd to schema and transformed with AT-import-fixer.xsl

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: The Chanticleer is Duke's annual student-produced yearbook. Focus is placed on high- quality photographs. The collection includes photographs, slides, negatives and contact sheets. Duplicates exist throughout the collection. The Collection also includes editing notes from Chanticleer staff. Most of the photographs are in black and white, although there are some in color. They range in date from circa 1998-ongoing.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Chanticleer Photograph Collection, Duke University Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Chanticleer Photograph Collection were received by the University Archives as a transfer in 2002-2003 and 2012.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Accessions A2002-75, A2003-1, and UA2012-0001 were merged into one collection, described in this finding aid.

bioghist.p: The Chanticleer is Duke's annual student-produced yearbook. The first issue was published in 1912. Its production is managed by the Undergraduate Publications Board.

scopecontent.p: The Chanticleer Photograph Collection includes photographs, slides, negatives and contact sheets. Duplicates exist throughout the collection. The collection also includes editing notes from Chanticleer staff. Most of the photographs are in black and white, although there are some in color, and the majority of them are unidentified. They range in date from circa 1998-ongoing.

controlaccess.head: Subject Headings
controlaccess.p: These are searchable subject entries for this collection. Performing a search on these subjects in the Duke University Libraries online catalog will bring up other related research materials.
